text: A Streetcar Named Desire is a 1951 movie. It is based on the 1947 play by Tennessee Williams. The movie stars Marlon Brando and Vivien Leigh. == Other websites == * Category:1951 drama movies Category:1950s American drama movies Category:United States National Film Registry movies Category:Multilingual movies Category:Movies directed by Elia Kazan Category:American plays Category:1947 works
title: A Streetcar Named Desire (1951 movie)
